3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Sunday Nguyen - 510-999-6663 - Double the potential: two homes, one lot, ONE PRICE! Main House 2039 exudes urban charm and modern comfort, featuring a spacious primary bedroom retreat, enhancing the sense of tranquility and privacy. The home is awash with natural light, boasting an open floor plan, a remodeled kitchen with quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances, and sleekly updated baths. Additional amenities include ample storage, in-unit laundry, and a fenced yard with room for entertainment or gardening. The newly constructed standalone ADU 2037 is a perfect blend of style and function, with a spacious bedroom, a contemporary kitchen, and a dedicated laundry area, all completed with city-approved permits. Both units have separated PG&E meters, streamlining utility management. Located conveniently near shops, restaurants, parks, and with easy access to public transportation, Bart, and the freeway, this property represents Oakland living at its finest. Choosing to live in one unit and rent out the other as an income-producing property, especially with the added value of an ADU, is a smart decision. Don't miss your chance to make this versatile property your dream home!

Contact the listing agent, SUNDAY NGUYEN, at 510-999-6663 for questions. Pre-Escrow Open with ORTC in Castro Valley Jenny Khuu. Sewer Lateral & Sidewalk Compliances. 2039 Main house is 1650 sqft, 3 beds 2 baths. 2037 ADU is 494 sqft, 1 bed 1 bath. Note: This listing is cross reference to Residential income Listing #41050309.
